Package blackjack

Class Game

java.lang.Object
blackjack.Game
public class Game extends Object
The Game class represents a single game of Blackjack. Manages the betting, balance, card dealing, result comparison, and file-based profit tracking using a file manager.
Author:
Eli L

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Hand player, Hand dealer, Deck deck)
      Constructs a new Game instance with the given player and dealer hands and deck.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's hand
      dealer - the dealer's hand
      deck - the deck to be used during the game

  • Method Details

    • putIn

      public boolean putIn(int stake)
      Tries to place a bet. Deducts the stake from the balance if possible.
      Parameters:
      stake - the amount to bet
      Returns:
      true if the bet was placed successfully; false otherwise

    • win

      public void win(double multiplier)
      Called when the player wins. Adds winnings to balance and updates high profit if needed.
      Parameters:
      multiplier - 2.5 for Blackjack, 2.0 for regular win, 1.0 for a push

    • lose

      public void lose()
      Called when the player loses. Updates profit tracking and resets the game if balance is zero.

    • compare

      public int compare()
      Compares the player and dealer hands to determine the game outcome.
      Returns:
      an integer code representing the result:
      • 30 = push
      • 21 = player Blackjack
      • 11 = dealer Blackjack
      • 22 = player bust
      • 12 = dealer bust
      • 23 = player wins by score
      • 13 = dealer wins by score

    • hit

      public Card hit()
      Deals a card to the player.
      Returns:
      the card dealt

    • stand

      public ArrayList<Card> stand()
      Executes the dealer's turn, where cards are drawn until the dealer has at least 17.
      Returns:
      a list of cards drawn by the dealer

    • getStake

      public int getStake()
      Returns:
      the current stake amount

    • setStake

      public void setStake(int stake)
      Sets the current stake.
      Parameters:
      stake - the new stake value

    • getWinnings

      public int getWinnings()
      Returns:
      the most recent winnings

    • getBalance

      public int getBalance()
      Returns:
      the current balance

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns:
      the player's current score

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the player's balance to the default value ($600).

    • isBetting

      public boolean isBetting()
      Returns:
      true if the game is currently in a betting state

    • setBetting

      public void setBetting(boolean betting)
      Sets the betting state.
      Parameters:
      betting - true to allow betting, false otherwise

    • getFileManager

      public FileManager getFileManager()
      Returns:
      the file manager used for profit tracking

    • readHighestProfit

      public int readHighestProfit()
      Reads and returns the highest profit recorded so far.
      Returns:
      the highest profit value from file
